project.component: { "keyToString": { ".NET Launch Settings Profile.TranslationApi: http.executor": "Run", ".NET Launch Settings Profile.TranslationApi: https.executor": "Run", ".NET Launch Settings Profile.TranslationWebApp: http.executor": "Run", "58c56b00-f81e-48fd-a74f-c8e84271fcf4.executor": "Debug", "Azure - Web App.Publish TranslationApi to Azure.executor": "Run", "Azure - Web App.RITTranslateWeb.executor": "Run", "Azure - Web App.RitTranslateWeb.executor": "Run", "Azure - Web App.RitTranslationApi.executor": "Run", "Azure - Web App.TranslationApi.executor": "Run", "Docker.Docker Image.executor": "Run", "Docker.TranslationApi/Dockerfile.executor": "Run", "Docker.TranslationWebApp/Dockerfile.executor": "Run", "Docker.compose.yaml: Compose Deployment.executor": "Run", "Publish to folder.Publish TranslationApi to folder.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "f747dd52-749d-48fa-86d8-49286900ec93.executor": "Debug", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "project.propVCSSupport.DirectoryMappings", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" }, "keyToStringList": { "com.intellij.ide.scratch.ScratchImplUtil$2/New Scratch File": [ "TEXT" ] } }

task.summary:
Add initial UI structure for TranslationWebApp
Introduces foundational views, layouts, and styles for the TranslationWebApp, including the language selector, translation interface, and error handling. This setup provides a base for further development and styling of the single-page application functionality.

Add VCS configuration for IntelliJ project
This commit introduces a vcs.xml file under the .idea directory to configure Git as the version control system for the project. This ensures proper VCS integration within IntelliJ IDEA.

Update assembly informational versions with build metadata
Updated the `AssemblyInformationalVersion` attributes across projects to include the latest build metadata (`+076b161fe8375d53a02de64e3627c828325848d8`). Additionally, modified NuGet info and cache files to reflect the new build state.

Add initial setup for TranslationWebApp views and layout
Introduced the main structure and styling for the TranslationWebApp, including basic SPA views, shared layouts, and error handling components. Also included required JavaScript, CSS files, and linked Bootstrap for UI styling. This sets the foundation for the application's functionality and design.

Add initial UI and foundational structure for TranslationWebApp
Introduce the TranslationWebApp with basic views, layouts, shared components, and styles to support a language translation UI. Includes error handling and language selection. Sets up project structure and dependencies like jQuery for further development.

Update README with project details and setup instructions
Added a detailed introduction, setup steps, and build/test guidelines for the project. Clarified dependencies, API integration, and configuration requirements for local execution. This ensures clarity for new users and contributors.

Update README with correct Releases Page URL
Replaced the placeholder URL for the Releases Page with the actual GitHub repository link. This ensures users can directly access the latest updates or releases without confusion.

Add third-party notices file for Playwright dependencies
This commit introduces a new `ThirdPartyNotices.txt` file containing legal notices and license information for third-party components used by Playwright. This ensures compliance with licensing requirements and provides transparency regarding included dependencies.

Add .gitignore to exclude build and Playwright files
Added a .gitignore file to prevent tracking build artifacts and Playwright-generated files. This helps keep the repository clean and avoids committing unnecessary files.

Load settings from JSON config in integration tests
Added a `testsettings.json` file to manage configurable settings. Updated tests to dynamically load the application URL from this file during the setup phase, replacing the hardcoded value. Introduced a `TestSettings` model to deserialize JSON configuration.

Add documentation and enhance translation test setup
Added XML documentation for integration tests and configuration models to improve code clarity. Updated test setup and descriptions to handle missing or invalid configuration settings. These changes ensure better readability, maintainability, and robust test execution.

Add testsettings.json for integration tests
Introduced a configuration file to store the application URL used for integration tests. This ensures consistent and centralized management of test settings.

Handle errors in translation and language fetching gracefully.
Added error handling in TranslateController methods to log exceptions and provide user-friendly error messages. Updated the Index view to display errors for unsupported language fetching. Minor formatting changes in TranslationProviderFactory for better readability.

Add configuration files for TranslationWebApp and TranslationApi
Introduced `appsettings.json` and `appsettings.Development.json` for both TranslationWebApp and TranslationApi to manage logging, hosting, and service settings. These files include environment-specific configurations like base addresses and allowed hosts for seamless deployment and debugging.

Remove IDE and deployment configuration files
Deleted Rider and Azure deployment-related files to clean up the repository. These files were specific to a local setup and are not needed in the repository to ensure a cleaner codebase.

MESSAGE.value:
Add initial UI structure for TranslationWebApp
Introduces foundational views, layouts, and styles for the TranslationWebApp, including the language selector, translation interface, and error handling. This setup provides a base for further development and styling of the single-page application functionality.

Add VCS configuration for IntelliJ project
This commit introduces a vcs.xml file under the .idea directory to configure Git as the version control system for the project. This ensures proper VCS integration within IntelliJ IDEA.

Update assembly informational versions with build metadata
Updated the `AssemblyInformationalVersion` attributes across projects to include the latest build metadata (`+076b161fe8375d53a02de64e3627c828325848d8`). Additionally, modified NuGet info and cache files to reflect the new build state.

Add initial setup for TranslationWebApp views and layout
Introduced the main structure and styling for the TranslationWebApp, including basic SPA views, shared layouts, and error handling components. Also included required JavaScript, CSS files, and linked Bootstrap for UI styling. This sets the foundation for the application's functionality and design.

Add initial UI and foundational structure for TranslationWebApp
Introduce the TranslationWebApp with basic views, layouts, shared components, and styles to support a language translation UI. Includes error handling and language selection. Sets up project structure and dependencies like jQuery for further development.

Update README with project details and setup instructions
Added a detailed introduction, setup steps, and build/test guidelines for the project. Clarified dependencies, API integration, and configuration requirements for local execution. This ensures clarity for new users and contributors.

Update README with correct Releases Page URL
Replaced the placeholder URL for the Releases Page with the actual GitHub repository link. This ensures users can directly access the latest updates or releases without confusion.

Add third-party notices file for Playwright dependencies
This commit introduces a new `ThirdPartyNotices.txt` file containing legal notices and license information for third-party components used by Playwright. This ensures compliance with licensing requirements and provides transparency regarding included dependencies.

Add .gitignore to exclude build and Playwright files
Added a .gitignore file to prevent tracking build artifacts and Playwright-generated files. This helps keep the repository clean and avoids committing unnecessary files.

Load settings from JSON config in integration tests
Added a `testsettings.json` file to manage configurable settings. Updated tests to dynamically load the application URL from this file during the setup phase, replacing the hardcoded value. Introduced a `TestSettings` model to deserialize JSON configuration.

Add documentation and enhance translation test setup
Added XML documentation for integration tests and configuration models to improve code clarity. Updated test setup and descriptions to handle missing or invalid configuration settings. These changes ensure better readability, maintainability, and robust test execution.

Add testsettings.json for integration tests
Introduced a configuration file to store the application URL used for integration tests. This ensures consistent and centralized management of test settings.

Refactor TranslationProviderFactory for readability
Removed unnecessary comments cluttering lines and improved the formatting for better code readability. This change does not alter functionality but ensures cleaner, more maintainable code.

Handle errors in translation and language fetching gracefully.
Added error handling in TranslateController methods to log exceptions and provide user-friendly error messages. Updated the Index view to display errors for unsupported language fetching. Minor formatting changes in TranslationProviderFactory for better readability.

Add configuration files for TranslationWebApp and TranslationApi
Introduced `appsettings.json` and `appsettings.Development.json` for both TranslationWebApp and TranslationApi to manage logging, hosting, and service settings. These files include environment-specific configurations like base addresses and allowed hosts for seamless deployment and debugging.

Remove IDE and deployment configuration files
Deleted Rider and Azure deployment-related files to clean up the repository. These files were specific to a local setup and are not needed in the repository to ensure a cleaner codebase.
